软件包 org.androidpn.server.xmpp.session
的使用

使用 org.androidpn.server.xmpp.session 的软件包
org.androidpn.server.xmpp.handler Handler classes for the routed IQs, messages, and presences. 
org.androidpn.server.xmpp.net Core classes for MINA based socket networking. 
org.androidpn.server.xmpp.session Classes for managing the client sessions. 
 

org.androidpn.server.xmpp.handler 使用的 org.androidpn.server.xmpp.session 中的类
SessionManager
          This class manages the sessions connected to the server.
 

org.androidpn.server.xmpp.net 使用的 org.androidpn.server.xmpp.session 中的类
Session
          This is an abstract class for a session between the server and a client.
 

org.androidpn.server.xmpp.session 使用的 org.androidpn.server.xmpp.session 中的类
ClientSession
          This class represents a session between the server and a client.
Session
          This is an abstract class for a session between the server and a client.
SessionManager
          This class manages the sessions connected to the server.
